general attributes.descricao: indicates the total Health value of the player.
indicates the total Stamina value of the player.
determines the overall value of the player's defensive armor. The higher this number, the less damage a player receives.
indicates the overall Encumbrance of the player's armor, which determines the type of Dodge and Stamina consumption.

tipos.descricao: Fast Dodge. No Stamina cost penality (average damage reduction: 25%)
Normal Dodge. 25% Stamina cost penality (average damage reduction: 30%)
Slow Dodge. 50% Stamina cost penality (average damage reduction: 35%)
Flop. 75% Stamina cost penality (average damage reduction: 50%)

general attributes.descricao: a weighted average of your Archetype level and Weapon Level. Used to calculate the World Level (which Is usually 1 point above your Power Level).
a weighted average of the highest level weapon in each slot.
the sum of the levels of your two highest level Archetypes.
combined total of all Archetype levels. increases the quality of dropped Relic Fragments.

atk/def attributes.descricao: increases the damage you deal to Enemies. Specific types of damage can be boosted separately.
determines the odds of acquiring a Critical Hit Chance on Enemies (added to the weapon's). Specific types of damage can have their Crit Chance boosted separately.
determines the damage bonus dealt with Critical Hit Damage on enemies and/or bosses (+50% by default).
Damage Reduction provided by your Armor.
total amount of Damage Reduction from all sources up to a maximum of 80% (effect DR and armor DR stack multiplicatively).

other attributes.descricao: increases the amount of healing provided to allies or yourself from any sources.
determines the value of Stamina recovered per second after a player executes actions that consume the stamina bar.

Every time you are hit by an attack, or when you are suffering damage over time, a portion of your lost health points is converted to Grey Health. Grey health is lost if you are hit by another attack.
specifies the value of Gray Health recovered per second (0.2 by default).
determines the amount of base damage dealt that is returned to you as health.

negative.descricao: deals bleed Damage over time and halves Total Healing Effectiveness.
deals fire Damage over time; some enemies may panic (removed faster by dodging).
deals acid Damage over time and increase damage taken by 10% (the defense reduction doesn't stack).
Target receives 15% additional damage from all sources.

Applies damage over time with the Fargazer Weapon Mod; stacks up to 10 times, each lasting 5 seconds. Damage and effects increase with more stacks. When applied to the player, it also slows movement and blurs vision. Stacks dissipate after 50 seconds if not reapplied.
deals shock Area Damage every 5 seconds over a certain duration; Damage increases by 10% for every other Overloaded enemy nearby.
reduces the target speed (ineffective against Bosses and Aberrations).

blights.descricao: reduces maximum Stamina by 1/3 and forces coughing animation at random intervals; found on Yaesha; can be cured with Oilskin Balm; can be prevented by wearing the Rotward ring.
inflicts a burst of damage; the bar immediately resets, allowing another instance to build-up.

other type.descricao: while it is building up, it forces a vomiting animation at random intervals; once fully built up, it instantly kills the player; found across the soft boundaries in N'Erud open areas.

blights.descricao: reduces maximum Health by 10%; stackable 5 times (50% health suppression); found in Losomn; can be cured by drinking the water in fountains found accross the map, or with Purified Salve; can be prevented by wearing the Hex Ward ring.

Applied via the Defrag Weapon Mod; causes targets to drop a 'Glitch' on death. Collecting the Glitch boosts damage by 20% for 15 seconds. Destroying it creates a Virus Pool that damages and applies Fragmented to enemies. Can also be used by the Annihilation Boss.
reduces Mod Power Generation by 50% and reduces Skill cooldowns by 100%; found on N'Erud; can be cured with Timeworn Unguent; can be prevented by wearing the Suppression Ward ring.
prevents you from using skills or consumables; found on Root Earth.
inflicts 0.5 damage per 0.5 seconds; found on the Infested Abyss.

positive.descricao: increases Damage Reduction by 7%. Bonus DR decreases with each successive stack up to a maximum of 5 stacks (25% DR)
increases all types of Speed (except movement speed) by 7%
